extracted_information: The website SmallSEOTools.com presents a large collection of online tools categorized for various purposes, primarily focused on SEO, content creation, image editing, and web management. The site's structure is organized around these categories, with individual tools listed under each heading. Navigation includes a main header with links to pricing, login, and popular tools, a language selector, and a footer containing popular tools, contact information, and site links (Terms, Privacy, Blog, FAQs, etc.). The main body of the homepage serves as a comprehensive list of tool categories and the tools within them, facilitating access to the wide range of services offered. The site employs pop-up/modal elements for advertisements (like Grammarly) and user feedback, and also includes prominent links to 'Pro' paid versions of some tools. A separate subdomain ('designstudio.smallseotools.com') is used for design-related tools, suggesting a potentially different architecture or platform for that specific suite.

pricing.overview: Free tools are available. 'Pro' versions with specific pricing are mentioned for certain tools.

tool_categories.name: Text Analysis Tools
tool_categories.description: A complete set of text tools is now at your fingertips. Check plagiarism, rewrite an article, run a spell checker, count words or change text case.

tool_categories.name: AI Writing Generators
tool_categories.description: Creating compelling content has become an effortless task with our range of AI writing tools. From generating an outline to writing a blog, essay, poem, or story, our AI writing toolkit has got you covered!

tool_categories.name: Design Studio
tool_categories.description: Craft awe-inspiring logos, posters, invitations, flyers, and resume with 1000+ premade templates offered with advanced designing tools on our DesignStudio

tool_categories.name: Images Editing Tools
tool_categories.description: Create a favicon, compress an image or resize a picture with a single click. All essentials for image editing are available in one place.

tool_categories.name: Keywords Tools
tool_categories.description: For webmasters and SEO professionals, free, powerful and efficient keyword tools that provide you with thorough keyword research and analysis.

tool_categories.name: BackLink Tools
tool_categories.description: A set of backlink analysis tool to give you a comprehensive inside view of your link profile.

tool_categories.name: Website Management Tools
tool_categories.description: If you are struggling to get more traffic and enhance your website performance, then use these website management tools and in-depth web analysis.

tool_categories.name: Website Tracking Tools
tool_categories.description: A list of free tools in one place to measure, monitor, and keep track of your websiteâ€™s performance.

tool_categories.name: Proxy Tools
tool_categories.description: Use proxy tools to know your IP location or to get a free daily proxy list

tool_categories.name: Domains Tools
tool_categories.description: A range of domain related tools to find out domain age, domain authority, DNS records or expired domains, etc.

tool_categories.name: Meta Tags Tools
tool_categories.description: Create new meta tags or analyze the existing ones to get an in-depth analysis of your meta tags and web pages.

tool_categories.name: Password Management Tools
tool_categories.description: Create a secure password, check password strength or encrypt a password; all tools related to password management are readily available.

tool_categories.name: Online PDF Tools
tool_categories.description: All the tools you need to work with PDF files, at your fingertips. Merge, rotate, unlock, lock, watermark and convert PDFs with just a few clicks.

ui_ux_patterns: Categorized list of tools on the homepage
Header navigation with key links (Login, Pricing, Language)
Footer navigation with extensive site links and contact info
Sections for 'Popular Tools' and 'Related Tools' (both in main body and footer)
Prominent links to 'Pro' versions/pricing for specific tools

site_architecture.description: The site architecture appears to be based on a main domain (smallseotools.com) hosting categorized tools, with a subdomain (designstudio.smallseotools.com) for a specific suite of tools. The homepage serves as a central directory listing all tool categories and links to individual tool pages. Navigation is structured hierarchically via categories and also provides cross-linking through 'Popular' and 'Related' tool lists.
